title: Split, Croatia
summary: Split (/ˈsplɪt/, as in the English word split;[5][6] Croatian pronunciation: [splît] (listen); see other names) is the second largest city of Croatia and the largest city in the region of Dalmatia. It lies on the eastern shore of the Adriatic Sea and is spread over a central peninsula and its surroundings. An intraregional transport hub and popular tourist destination, the city is linked to the Adriatic islands and the Apennine Peninsula.
